title: added tsci build and tsci snapshot workflows

title: add SparkFun USB to Serial Breakout FT232RL
description: The addition of the SparkFun USB to Serial Breakout FT232RL enhances the repository by providing a new component for users, facilitating USB to serial communication in their projects.

title: included imported file into local file
description: Introduces a new component for the MCP4725 I2C DAC, enhancing the library's functionality.
